text: The Union Civil Service Board (, abbreviated UCSB) is Burma's national civil service commission. It was formed on 28 October 2010 in accordance with the 2010 State Peace and Development Council Law. Its predecessor was the Public Service Commission (PSC), which was initially formed on 1 April 1937. Yangon Branch ==References== ==See also== * Ministry of Home Affairs Category:Government agencies of Myanmar Category:National civil service commissions Category:2010 establishments in Myanmar Category:Government agencies established in 2010
title: Union Civil Service Board
